name: ParasoftCodeCoverageQualityGate
description: Check Parasoft Code Coverage Quality Gate
author: Parasoft Corporation

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of code coverage to be evaluated for the threshold.

inputs.name: threshold
inputs.label: Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the value of code coverage is less than this threshold, then a build is considered unstable or failed, respectively. Default value is 0.0. The range must be between 0 and 100, any value outside this range will be set to 0 or 100.

validation.message: The range must be between 0 and 100

inputs.name: buildStatus
inputs.label: Build status if quality gate fails
inputs.helpMarkDown: Mark the build as unstable or failed if the quality gate fails.

instanceNameFormat: Parasoft Code Coverage Quality Gate - $(type) code lines - $(threshold)
